BodyOfContent.Paragraph1: We are pleased to offer you the position of Accountant at Amaze Fox. We feel confident that you will contribute your skills and experience towards the growth of our organization.
BodyOfContent.Paragraph2: Please find the employee handbook enclosed herewith which contains the medical and retirement benefits offered by our organizations.
BodyOfContent.Paragraph3: Please confirm your acceptance of this offer by signing and returning a copy of this offer letter.
BodyOfContent.Paragraph4: If you have any questions regarding the same, contact the manager or me via email or phone: 456-6780-21
BodyOfContent.Paragraph5: We look forward to welcoming you on board.
